channel.title: I need help with the cache!
channel.description:
So I give the players the client but the cache doesn't download! One the client file it says this: *please extract erasedpkzcache1 to your c:/ drive* Does anyone know where to put the cache? :O
Willing to pay someone 10$ Via paypal if they figure this problem out!

Can someone help me out? Teamviewer anything?

item.title: I need help with the cache!

item.description:
@jeake wrote:

just zip the erasedpkz1 cache and make it a .rar file then extract the cache to your c:/ drive, its really not that hard

item.source: I need help with the cache!

item.title: I need help with the cache!
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

Can you load the cache when you run the client?

I say that because…

If you can’t first extract the cache to your local disk folder. The (c:). Go to start, computer local disk drive whatever there!

And look. Your players can’t connect because look at it this way. They are trying to download the cache from where? Your computer. How are they going to get that?

You need to upload it to a file hosting website like dropbox. www.dropbox.com and then set a link in signlink.java.

Theres loads of tuts on google just google if you don’t get me.

Read full topic
